title: Project chests, need help w/ end date.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Hello I am wondering when the chests I circled in the imgur link I put into the post are going to be going away, is it when the missions for the project skins end in 10 days?

replies.body: The chests are limited to this Project event, [announced ](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-project-hunters-event)here.  You still have some time, but December 4 will be here before you know it!

But how about the RP sale?
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/aAE77dmu-are-there-going-to-be-a-rp-sale-for-this-christmas?comment=0000

It has happened before:
https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/tag/extra-bonus-rp

Being able to buy Hextech keys with BE, especially in the BE emporium, and gifting champions with BE would be nice too.
